name: react-native-paged-scroll-view-r
description: A higher-order React Native component to compute the current and total pages of a ScrollView

scripts.build: mkdir -p lib && babel src --out-dir lib && cp lib/PagedScrollViewR.js PagedScrollViewExample/PagedScrollView.js
scripts.prepublish: npm run test && npm run clean && npm run build

author: Ricky Reusser
